body:
Hello,
I'm trying to compile bitcoin for android but it doesn't work:

```
x@x:~ $ git clone https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git
Cloning into 'bitcoin'...
remote: Enumerating objects: 2, done.
remote: Counting objects: 100% (2/2), done.
remote: Total 190718 (delta 1), reused 1 (delta 1), pack-reused 190716
Receiving objects: 100% (190718/190718), 159.53 MiB | 1.23 MiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (136090/136090), done.
x@x:~ $ cd bitcoin/depends/
x@x:~/bitcoin/depends$ make HOST=aarch64-linux-android
/bin/sh: 1: /aarch64-linux-android-clang: not found
/bin/sh: 1: /aarch64-linux-android-clang: not found
/bin/sh: 1: /aarch64-linux-android-clang++: not found
/bin/sh: 1: /aarch64-linux-android-clang++: not found
Fetching boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2 from https://dl.bintray.com/boostorg/release/1.71.0/source/
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
  0     0    0     0    0     0      0      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--     0
100 95.4M  100 95.4M    0     0  1220k      0  0:01:20  0:01:20 --:--:-- 1277k
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/download/native_b2-1_71_0/boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2.temp: OK
Extracting native_b2...
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/sources/boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2: OK
Preprocessing native_b2...
Configuring native_b2...
Building native_b2...
###
###
### Using 'gcc' toolset.
###
###
g++ --version
g++ (Ubuntu 7.5.0-3ubuntu1~18.04) 7.5.0
Copyright (C) 2017 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

###
###
g++ -x c++ -std=c++11 -O2 -s -DNDEBUG builtins.cpp class.cpp command.cpp compile.cpp constants.cpp cwd.cpp debug.cpp debugger.cpp execcmd.cpp filesys.cpp frames.cpp function.cpp glob.cpp hash.cpp hcache.cpp hdrmacro.cpp headers.cpp jam.cpp jambase.cpp jamgram.cpp lists.cpp make.cpp make1.cpp md5.cpp mem.cpp modules.cpp native.cpp object.cpp option.cpp output.cpp parse.cpp pathsys.cpp regexp.cpp rules.cpp scan.cpp search.cpp strings.cpp subst.cpp sysinfo.cpp timestamp.cpp variable.cpp w32_getreg.cpp modules/order.cpp modules/path.cpp modules/property-set.cpp modules/regex.cpp modules/sequence.cpp modules/set.cpp execunix.cpp fileunix.cpp pathunix.cpp -o b2
debugger.cpp: In function âvoid debug_mi_format_breakpoint(int)â:
debugger.cpp:1837:16: warning: zero-length gnu_printf format string [-Wformat-zero-length]
     printf( "" );
                ^
debugger.cpp: In function âLIST* debug_list_read(FILE*)â:
debugger.cpp:165:11: warning: ignoring return value of âint fscanf(FILE*, const char*, ...)â, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     fscanf( in, "%d", &len );
     ~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
cp b2 bjam
Staging native_b2...
Postprocessing native_b2...
Caching native_b2...
Extracting boost...
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/sources/boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2: OK
Preprocessing boost...
Configuring boost...
Unicode/ICU support for Boost.Regex?... disabled.
Generating Boost.Build configuration in project-config.jam for clang...

Bootstrapping is done. To build, run:

    ./b2
    
To generate header files, run:

    ./b2 headers

To adjust configuration, edit 'project-config.jam'.
Further information:

   - Command line help:
     ./b2 --help
     
   - Getting started guide: 
     http://www.boost.org/more/getting_started/unix-variants.html
     
   - Boost.Build documentation:
     http://www.boost.org/build/

Building boost...
sh: 1: /aarch64-linux-android-clang++: not found
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/tools/clang-linux.jam:63: in clang-linux.init
*** argument error
* rule clang.init-cxxstd-flags ( toolset : condition * : version )
* called with: ( clang-linux : <toolset>clang-linux :  )
* missing argument version
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/tools/clang.jam:54:see definition of rule 'clang.init-cxxstd-flags' being called
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/build/toolset.jam:44: in toolset.using
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/tools/clang.jam:33: in clang.init
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/build/toolset.jam:44: in toolset.using
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/build/project.jam:1104: in using
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/user-config.jam:1: in modules.load
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/build-system.jam:255: in load-config
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/build-system.jam:449: in load-configuration-files
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/build-system.jam:607: in load
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/kernel/modules.jam:295: in import
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/tools/build/src/kernel/bootstrap.jam:139: in boost-build
/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/boost-build.jam:17: in module scope
funcs.mk:279: recipe for target '/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/./.stamp_built' failed
make: *** [/home/x/bitcoin/depends/work/build/aarch64-linux-android/boost/1_71_0-e9f4bd7622f/./.stamp_built] Error 1
x@x:~/bitcoin/depends$
title: Can't compile bitcoin for Android
